data.subject: 집으로
data.lyric:
그 때 듣던 그 목소리 
 다시 들을 수 있을까
 벌써 옛날이죠 
 붉은 장미와 좁은 골목길 
 난 아직 어렸죠
 노란 가로등이 켜진 밤이면 
 가슴 설레죠
 누군가를 기다렸었죠

data.subject: I dreamed a dream
data.lyric:
There was a time when love was blind
 And the world was a song
 And the song was exciting
 There was

data.subject: Say something
data.lyric:
say something
 I'm giving up on you
 I'll be the one if you want me to
 anywhere I would've followed
